title: Vladimir Shishkin
text:
Vladimir Shishkin (<a href="Russian%20language">Russian</a>: Владимир Шишкин; born 12 January 1964) is a retired <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n athlete who specialised in the <a href="sprint%20hurdles">sprint hurdles</a>. He competed at two Olympic Games as well as two World Championships. His best placings were fourth at the <a href="1988%20Summer%20Olympics">1988 Olympics</a> and sixth at the <a href="1991%20World%20Championships%20in%20Athletics">1991 World Championships</a>.
His personal bests are 13.21 seconds in the <a href="110%20metres%20hurdles">110 metres hurdles</a> (+1.8 m/s, Leningrad 1988) and 7.57 seconds in the <a href="60%20metres%20hurdles">60 metres hurdles</a> (Ghent 1990).
